Favorite villager is Merry!

I was actually going to make a post about the relationship between Jun and the rest of Seventeen, but I feared that I might get flamed for it as I am a relatively new carat(only about 3 weeks), so my experience might be very different from old carats. A lot of carats like to think that there isn't anything between Jun and the rest of SVT because they laugh at his ''jokes'', but I can't help but feel like some of the members are laughing AT him and not WITH him. I think some of the members think he is a weird person and that might be why we see that Jun's relationship with some of the other members might be awkward. I don't know if other carats feel this way, but I especially think that Jun and Seungkwan have an awkward relationship, which might be because they have such different relationships. Also with Dino. Personally, I have seen this on multiple occasion(from the videos I have seen as a new carat), but it might just be me overanalyzing things from personal real-life experiences. As a new carat, for a while I couldn't watch any SVT content for a while because it was a bit triggering and painful to watch the members attitute towards Jun. But non of us now the members IRL and we don't know what happens behind the scenes, so my or your opinion might be completely invalid. I just really wanted to let this out because I am sure some other carats feel the same way although I couldn't find any posts about this.
Which program did you use for the colour wheels? I am new to this subreddit
Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: Is the S6 Lite S Pen too small?
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, I am considering buying the S6 Lite for taking notes in university. I got to play around with it a bit from a friend of mine and I really like it so far. However, I am concerned that the S Pen might be too small/thin. I will be writing using the pen for a while as I study a lot, so comfort is very important to me. Could you please tell me about your experience with the pen for taking notes? Alternatives to the S Pen(if there are any good ones) would also be appreciated.

WRITING.TITLE: Support for S6 Lite
WRITING.TEXT: I've decided to buy the Tab S6 Lite for note-taking. I really like everything about this tablet, but I'm worried about the support for it and how long it will hold up, as I have heard that Samsung tablets aren't as supported as other tablets. How many years are Samsung tablets usually supported? And will it still be in good shape after a couple of years if I am mostly using it for note taking and PDFs?
Thought this was r/kpopthoughts for a sec #128579;
That's great to hear. That's mostly what I will be using it for too, so I wanted to make sure that I don't get any hand cramps.
I think it might have to do with how their hair is styled. I think that makes the hair flowier.

WRITING.TITLE: Does tre Apple Pencil work better when Bluetooth is turned on?
WRITING.TEXT: I have ben using Apple Pencil 1 on the iPad 10.2 2019 with Bluetooth turned OFF(I would only turn it on to connect it to the iPad). I thought Bluetooth always had to be on, but the pencil has worked without. Is there a difference in using the pencil with Bluetooth turned ON?
Dokyeom
Oh, I didn't know that! Thanks!
Is this a beta feature?
